Introduction¶

lglass is a collection of several Python modules for Internet Registries and darknets, designed for the DN42 darknet. It was written entirely in Python 3.3 and includes provide a ton of tools and libraries for registry management and public registry services.

At the moment, lglass contains the following features:

  • Registry management
  • Whois service
  • DNS zone generation
  • Network visualisation using GraphVIZ
  • Interface for BIRD
  • Representation of routing tables
  • Simple web interface
  • ROA table generator
